channel.title: Monk-Scape
channel.description:
[center]A short video of the progress.
[URL=http://s471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/?action=view&current=clip0050-1.flv][IMG]http://i471.photobucket.com/albums/rr71/Master_Monk_2009/th_clip0050-1.jpg[/img][/URL]
Project's
- 80% Lumby stairs. :) Added a interface to the 2nd story of the lumby castle.
- Adding Tele Tabs (Not Hard But Fun ;))
- Adding Barrelchest achor special.
- fixing ancients small glitches Here And There)
- Making more pvp areas e.g Grand Exchange, Banks, Skill Area's (Easy)[/center]
[center][s]- Make the server Low Detail and High Detail.[/s] DONE! :D[/center]
[center]This is just a start on the project, it only started about 3 days ago ;)[/center]
[center]Please post any idea's or questions![/center]

item.title: Monk-Scape
item.dc:creator: @Master_Monk Master Monk
item.description:
@Master_Monk wrote:

[center]A short video of the progress.

Project’s

  • 80% Lumby stairs. Added a interface to the 2nd story of the lumby castle.

  • Adding Tele Tabs (Not Hard But Fun ;))

  • Adding Barrelchest achor special.

  • fixing ancients small glitches Here And There)

  • Making more pvp areas e.g Grand Exchange, Banks, Skill Area’s (Easy)[/center]

[center]- Make the server Low Detail and High Detail. DONE! :D[/center]

[center]This is just a start on the project, it only started about 3 days ago ;)[/center]

[center]Please post any idea’s or questions![/center]
